name: Pandemonium (itch)
description:
Some bacteria have a trait known as competence. Bacteria with competence can adsorb DNA pieces from their environment and add it to their own DNA.  Some competent bacteria will even kill other bacteria for DNA they need!
This game is very loosely based on the competence of bacteria.  After each wave of this game, the player is offered different DNA pieces they can choose to incorporate into their DNA.
Pandemonium is defined by the Oxford Living Dictionary as: "
wild uproar or unrestrained disorder; tumult or chaos.a place or scene of riotous uproar or utter chaos."
